articles.content: India's series New Zealand ended being a bitter-sweet affair for the Men in Blue as they began the tour by winning the T20Is but concluded it by losing the ODIs, both by a 1-0 margin. A series that c… [+2584 chars]

articles.author: SportsCafe Desk
articles.title: PKL | Pawan Sehrawat to make a comeback, but as a commentator - SportsCafe
articles.description: Right at the start of the PKL 2022, Tamil Thalaivas' latest buy, star raider Pawan Sehrawat was badly injured and was ruled out for an indefinite time. Finally, the hi-flyer is back, albeit as a commentator for the Pro Kabaddi League, starting Friday's triple…
articles.content: On the other hand, Sehrawat still looks irreplaceable, as he is one of the best in the business, having scored 987 raid points. In terms of overall points, he is ranked fifth in the charts, behind UP… [+206 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Make a place for him. He has everything that should be there in a superstar’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In the absence of all-rounders Ravindra Jadeja and Axar Patel, Washington impressed cricket experts with his all-round skills. Former India opener Aakash Chopra lavished praised on him and called the 23-year-old a proper all-rounder on whom Team India managem…
articles.content: Washington Sundar shone with the bat and hit a half century to take Team India to a respectable total of 219/10 in 47.3 overs, against hosts New Zealand in the third One-Day International(ODI) on Wed… [+2101 chars]
